name: Island Life
description:
In a deserted island, the island is full of zombies, the player (from the first person perspective) needs to successfully survive and destroy all zombies, the player can use materials to build buildings, use weapons to attack zombies, kill all zombies and survive to win.
Player control buttons:
WASD movement
Escape
TAB people panel
Left mouse button attack
Right-click targeting
Squats C
Run Left Shift
Pick up E
Mouse direction
Item menu right click
